channel.title: Maajid Nawaz on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Maajid Nawaz on The Majority

item.title: Sturgeon told to apologise for racism within ranks
item.description:
https://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/1288769/Nicola-sturgeon-news-maajid-Nawaz-racism-twitter-snp-news-latest

Essex-born Maajid Nawaz warned First Minister Nicola Sturgeon “racist” online nationalists have “f*cked with the wrong Muslim this time”. In a furious tirade, Mr Nawaz said it was “about time” Ms Sturgeon controlled her “Scottish nationalist racists” after he said he received racist abuse on Twitter from SNP supporters.
